com.nordicid.nurapi

Interface NurApiListener


  • public interface NurApiListener
    The API's listener. Listen's to various event such as inventory stream NurEventInventory, tag trace NurEventTraceTag, NXP EAS alarm NurEventNxpAlarm events.
